1.name: Taxi Driver
1.description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

2.name: Carrie
2.description: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

3.name: Rocky
3.description: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

4.name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
4.description: Missouri farmer Josey Wales (Clint Eastwood) joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

5.name: King Kong
5.description: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

6.name: Network
6.description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

7.name: All the President's Men
7.description: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

8.name: The Omen
8.description: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

9.name: Logan's Run
9.description: An idyllic science fiction future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of thirty.

10.name: A Star Is Born
10.description: A has-been rock star falls in love with a young, up-and-coming songstress.

11.name: The Bad News Bears
11.description: An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.

12.name: Marathon Man
12.description: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

13.name: Novecento
13.description: The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth century Italy, as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

14.name: Le locataire
14.description: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

15.name: Bugsy Malone
15.description: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all-child cast.

16.name: Murder by Death
16.description: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

17.name: Midway
17.description: A dramatization of the battle that was widely heralded as a turning point of the Pacific Theatre of World War II.

18.name: Communion
18.description: In 1961 suburban New Jersey, a withdrawn adolescent girl is suspected of her younger sister's brutal murder during her First Communion, and a series of subsequent stabbings.

19.name: Assault on Precinct 13
19.description: An unlikely partnership between a Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.

20.name: Futureworld
20.description: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

21.name: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
21.description: In 1946, a hooded serial killer terrorizes the residents of a small Arkansas town.

22.name: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
22.description: 13-year-old Rynn Jacobs lives alone in a high-class Quebec small town, but unknown to the neighbors, she is leading a secret and dangerous life.

23.name: Stay Hungry
23.description: So-called 'special agent' infiltrates into the gym, which is targeted by a dirty business fraud.

24.name: Salon Kitty
24.description: Kitty runs a brothel in Nazi Germany where the soldiers come to "relax". Recording devices have been installed in each room by a power hungry army official, who plans to use the information to blackmail Hitler and gain power himself.

25.name: The Man Who Fell to Earth
25.description: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and greed of other men create complications.

26.name: Eaten Alive
26.description: A psychotic redneck, who owns a dilapidated hotel in rural East Texas, kills various people who upset him or his business, and he feeds their bodies to a large crocodile that he keeps as a pet in the swamp beside his hotel.

27.name: The Shootist
27.description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

28.name: The Eagle Has Landed
28.description: A German plot to kidnap Sir Winston Churchill unfolds at the height of World War II.

29.name: Freaky Friday
29.description: A mother and daughter find their personalities switched and have to live each other's lives on one strange Friday.

30.name: Burnt Offerings
30.description: A family moves into a large old mansion that seems to have a mysterious and maybe even sinister power over their actions.

31.name: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
31.description: Charles Dreyfus, who has finally cracked over inspector Clouseau's antics, escapes from a mental institution and launches an elaborate plan to get rid of Clouseau once and for all.

32.name: The Cassandra Crossing
32.description: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease. Nobody will let them off the train. So what happens next?

33.name: The Human Tornado
33.description: Dolemite flees to California, where he helps Queen Bee and her Kung Fu prostitutes battle a local gangster.

34.name: The Slipper and the Rose: The Story of Cinderella
34.description: In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King (Sir Michael Hordern) and his court are most anxious to get Prince Edward (Richard Chamberlain) wed. But Edward wants to marry for love. Meanwhile...                See full summary »

35.name: The Last Tycoon
35.description: F. Scott Fitzgerald's novel is brought to life in this story of a movie producer slowly working himself to death.

36.name: Ai no korîda
36.description: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to a sexual obsession which then came to a violent end.

37.name: The Enforcer
37.description: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan (Clint Eastwood) must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with female partner Inspector Kate Moore (Tyne Daly), with whom he's not too excited to be working.

38.name: Robin and Marian
38.description: Robin Hood, aging none too gracefully, returns exhausted from the Crusades to woo and win Maid Marian one last time.

39.name: Up!
39.description: This kicks off with the murder of one Adolf Schwartz (who bears a striking resemblance to another famous Adolf) by placing a ravenous piranha fish in his bathtub. Who did it? No-one knows ...                See full summary »

40.name: Family Plot
40.description: A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/private investigator boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.

41.name: Obsession
41.description: A wealthy New Orleans businessman becomes obsessed with a young woman who resembles his wife.

42.name: Gator
42.description: Agents force a former con man to help them nab a corrupt politician.

43.name: Lifeguard
43.description: Rick is in his 30s, but still works full-time as a lifeguard on the beaches of Los Angeles, California. He enjoys the fun of it, but even more, the silent moments. However, when he meets ...                See full summary »

44.name: The Missouri Breaks
44.description: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

45.name: Car Wash
45.description: A comedic take on the daily life of a car wash employees, chronicling their hopes, fears, joys, dreams and tribulations. And meeting a few eccentric costumers along the way.

46.name: Satan's Slave
46.description: A young girl is caught up in a devil cult run by her evil uncle and cousin. She can trust no one and even people she thought were dead comes back to haunt her.

47.name: Silver Streak
47.description: On a long-distance train trip, a man finds romance but also finds himself in danger of being killed, or at least pushed off the train.

48.name: To the Devil a Daughter
48.description: An American occult novelist battles to save the soul of a young girl from a group of Satanists, led by an excommunicated priest, who plan on using her as the representative of the Devil on Earth.

49.name: The Message
49.description: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

50.name: Silent Movie
50.description: A film director and his strange friends struggle to produce the first major silent feature film in forty years.
